control.description: number of files/pages in list text label
control.label: $([COLOR=blue]$INFO[Container(3).NumItems][/COLOR]) $LOCALIZE[31025] - $LOCALIZE[31024] ([COLOR=blue]$INFO[Container(3).CurrentPage]/$INFO[Container(3).NumPages][/COLOR])
